title: Bikerhelmets.com - World's Smallest Motorcycle Helmet - DOT Approved Ultra Low Profile Beanie - Gloss Black With Peak - X-Small
features: No more mushroom head! This is the helmet that started it all.  Join the 50,000+ riders who have been wearing our helmets since 2008!
With an Ultra Low Profile it sits low and snug on your head - the Smallest & Lightest DOT shell size ever made!
Meets or exceeds DOT FMVSS No. 218 standards
Quick release adjustable straps for easy helmet removal
SIZING: Our helmets fit differently - please verify your size with our sizing chart; NOTE: Helmets are quite snug when brand new, but relax and mold to your head over the first several rides
description: Crazy Al's has proudly been eradicating mushroom head with DOT Approved Ultra Low Profile helmets since 2008.Ultra Low Profile Beanie helmet, say goodbye to mushroom head! This is the helmet that over 50,000 riders wear!Smallest & lightest DOT shell size ever made!Meets or exceeds DOT FMVSS No. 218 standardsQuick release adjustable straps for easy helmet removalDesigned in North America, Manufactured in China, Made of FiberglassOnly use water to clean our helmetsSIZING: Our helmets fit differently - please verify your size with our sizing chartSIZING NOTE: Helmets are quite snug when brand new, but relax and mold to your head over the first several ridesTo measure your head for the correct size take a tape measure just above your brow around your head just at the top of your ears. If your head measures in between sizes order the size smaller.SIZING CHARTXXS 50.8 - 52.07 inches |  20 - 20 1/2 cmXS 53.02 - 53.98 inches | 20 7/8 - 21 1/4 cmS 54.93 - 55.88 inches | 21 5/8 - 22 cmM 56.83 - 57.79 inches | 22 3/8 - 22 3/4 cmL 59.05 - 60.00 inches | 23 1/4 - 23 5/8 cmXL 60.96 - 61.91 inches | 24 - 24 3/8 cmXXL 62.87 - 64.12 inches | 24 3/4 - 25 1/4
